shortdesc.ph: The information about the specified shareable window or screen. It is returned in .

p.codeblock: export class ScreenCaptureSourceInfo { type?: ScreenCaptureSourceType sourceId?: any sourceName?: string thumbImage?: ThumbImageBuffer iconImage?: ThumbImageBuffer processPath?: string sourceTitle?: string primaryMonitor?: boolean isOccluded?: boolean }

plentry.pd: The type of the shared target. See .
The window ID for a window or the display ID for a screen.
The name of the window or screen. UTF-8 encoding.

pd.ph: The image content of the thumbnail.
The image content of the icon.

plentry.pd: The process to which the window belongs. UTF-8 encoding.
The title of the window. UTF-8 encoding.

Determines whether the screen is the primary display:
: The screen is the primary display.
: The screen is not the primary display.
